extensionDescription.message: Display QR Code images for current active tab URL and for an unified URL of all highlighted tabs

extensionTitle.message: Show current tab URL as QR Code

clickToZoom.description: Zoom in generated QR Code image

resetZoom.description: Resets zoom on the generated QR Code image

downloadImage.description: Save generated QR Code image as PNG

highlightedTabInstructions.message: Select (highlight) two or more tabs to create a single unified link address
highlightedTabInstructions.description: Message shown when there is not enough highlighted tabs
